${modID}:PowerID.NAME: Ultimate Power
DESCRIPTIONS: You are Very Cool and Strong.

${modID}:Concentration.NAME: Concentration
DESCRIPTIONS: Some cards get enhanced by spending #bConcentration.
The Focused keyword signifies cards that can do this.

${modID}:Ammo.NAME: Ammo
DESCRIPTIONS: Consumed by specific cards.
Cannot play #yAmmo cards without the minimum amount.

${modID}:Steady.NAME: Steady
DESCRIPTIONS: #yBlast does triple damage. Decreases per use.

${modID}:Cursed.NAME: Cursed
DESCRIPTIONS: Cursed does damage equal to its stacks when you end your turn.
Five stacks are removed after damage is applied.

${modID}:BackupMagazine.NAME: Backup Magazine
DESCRIPTIONS: Add #yBlast into your hand at the start of your turn.

${modID}:GrudgeP.NAME: Grudge
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, apply Curse to all enemies.

${modID}:CatalystPrimers.NAME: Catalyst Primers
DESCRIPTIONS: Exhausting cards deals damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:Attuned.NAME: Attuned
DESCRIPTIONS: Playing elemental cards with this power adds an extra effect.
Fire: 5 Vigor.
Thunder: ALL enemies are hit for 8 damage.
Wind: A random enemy is hit for 12 damage.
Water: Gain 6 Block.
Playing non-element cards removes this power.

${modID}:Erosion.NAME: Erosion
DESCRIPTIONS: Eroded enemies take more damage based on stack amount. nL
Increases by 1 each turn.

${modID}:GatheringShores.NAME: Gathering Shores
DESCRIPTIONS: Add Torrent to your hand at 3 stacks.
Remove all stacks.

${modID}:SelfSpreadingCurse.NAME: Self-Spreading Curse
DESCRIPTIONS: Take damage equal to stacks at end of turn.
If an enemy hits you, lose one stack and apply eight Cursed.
